issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Fix creating buckets without scheme information

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Empty buckets are not created on non-HDFS file system

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Query Processor
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with query processing.

fields.description: If a table is created on a non-default filesystem (i.e. non-hdfs), the empty files will be created with incorrect scheme information. This patch extracts the scheme and authority information for the new paths.
fields.summary: Fix creating buckets without scheme information
